name: Emric Öhman
obverse: Bust of Emric Öhman facing left.
reverse: A coat of arms with a crowned man at the top with Mercury's head at the bottom. Inscription in 8 lines.
reverse_inscriptions: STOCKHOLMS KÖPMANSKLUBB TILL SIN FRÄMSTE GRUNDARE SIN STÄNDIGE SEKRETERARE SIN LIVGIVANDE KRAFT
description: Emric Öhman was one of the founders of the Stockholm Merchant Club.
